title: How to Make a Kid Juice Cocktail

methods.name: Lemonade, apple and grape juice mocktail

steps.headline: Add 1/2 cup apple juice.
steps.description: Pour slowly so when the other juices collide the sugars will not mix the wrong way.

steps.headline: Very slowly add lemon juice or lemonade, so that apple juice doesn't make it too sweet and the lemon juice doesn't overpower the sweetness of the apple juice and if that happens you'll have to start all over.
Add grape juice.
steps.description: Do it fast so it will taste good.

methods.name: Apple, lemonade and citrus juice mocktail

steps.headline: Add the lemon juice and sugar to the blender.
Blend for 2 minutes until a it forms a thin paste.
Add the lemonade or fizzy water.
Add the apple and orange juices.
Blend for 3 minutes.
steps.description: It's done when it turns frothy and looks an even orange color.

steps.headline: Pour into a tall cup.
steps.description: Add a couple of ice cubes, and a straw.

text: Lemonade, apple and grape juice mocktail Add 1/2 cup apple juice. Pour slowly so when the other juices collide the sugars will not mix the wrong way. Very slowly add lemon juice or lemonade, so that apple juice doesn't make it too sweet and the lemon juice doesn't overpower the sweetness of the apple juice and if that happens you'll have to start all over.  Add grape juice. Do it fast so it will taste good. Finished.  Apple, lemonade and citrus juice mocktail Add the lemon juice and sugar to the blender.  Blend for 2 minutes until a it forms a thin paste.  Add the lemonade or fizzy water.  Blend for 1and a half minutes. Pulse until thoroughly mixed. Add the apple and orange juices.  Blend for 3 minutes. It's done when it turns frothy and looks an even orange color. Pour into a tall cup. Add a couple of ice cubes, and a straw.
